Package model

Class Process

java.lang.Object
model.Process
public class Process extends Object
The Process class handles the different stages of a customer's experience in the restaurant simulation, such as ordering, waiting, being served, and paying. It manages the active orders, kitchen orders, and tracks the number of total customers present.

    • getTotalCustomers

      public int getTotalCustomers()
      Calculates the total number of customers in the restaurant, including active orders, waiting customers, served customers, and customers who are paying.
      Returns:
      The total number of customers in the restaurant.

    • getHighestTotalCustomers

      public int getHighestTotalCustomers()
      Retrieves the highest total number of customers that have been processed in the system.
      Returns:
      The highest total number of customers.

    • processQueue

      public void processQueue()
      Processes the customer queue by assigning customers to available machines, updating their status, and simulating the ordering process. It inserts the ordering event data into the database.

    • moveToKitchen

      public void moveToKitchen(int id, Menu.MealType meal)
      Moves a customer to the kitchen for meal preparation after they have ordered.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer.
      meal - The meal that was ordered by the customer.
